_header: In a thester study I stood a little strife to hear
Subjects: debates, body and soul; body and soul, debate between
_description: Debate between the Body and the Soul — twenty-seven four-line stanzas, the first with medial rhyme

BodDig86.First Lines:
Hon an þester stude I stod an luitel strif to hereHof an bodi
                    þat was oungod þer hit lai on þe bere…
BodDig86.Last Lines:
…þenne seiz þe gost weilavei and þer affter
                    alasWo worþe þat ilke stounde bodi þat þou boren
                    was
BodDig86.Attributed Title:
Hic incipit carmen inter corpus & animam (f.
                    195v)
BodDig86.Facsimiles:

EETS
         s.s. 16 (1996).

CamTCC323.First Lines:
In an þestrei stude ic stod a lutel strif to iherenOf an bodi
                    þat was ungoid ser hit lei on one bere…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…Jesus crist us grantein his seruise to henden& þe
                    blisse of hevene mid engles into wenden
CamTCC323.Attributed Title:
Hic incipit carmen inter corpus & animam (f.
                    195v)

BLHar2253.First Lines:
IN a þestri stude y stod a lutel strif to hereof a body
                    þat was vn god þer hit lay on a bere…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…to wroþere hele þat euer we in londe comen hereto
                    þin holp halewen crist bring vs alle yfere amen.
